title: Unbroken
description: Shattered promises make for broken people.Fight for freedom, for country, and for love. That was my MO but after the ultimate betrayal, I put my life on hold.My Name is Joshua McLaren and between being a Hospital Corpsman, EMT, and father, I have no room in my life for relationships. Women weren’t even on my radar. Work, eat, and sleep. That’s it.It was just supposed to be another answered call. Routine in its entirety. Then, I held that little girl in my arms. Saw the damage done at another’s hands. Felt the pull to my soul. I can’t let them go. I can’t leave Magnolia Gossett alone. The protector in me needs this. Needs to do something, make it right.In helping her I’m finding that love matters, and some promises may have to be broken.Trigger WarningViolenceErotic ElementsStrong Language
author: J. Haney
